title: EuroLLM - European Large Language Model Initiative
description: Developing a sovereign European large language model that respects European values and multilingual capabilities.

title: CLAIRE - Confederation of Laboratories for AI Research in Europe
description: Pan-European network fostering excellence in AI research and innovation across European institutions.

title: AI4Media - AI for Media and Creative Industries
description: Advancing AI technologies for next-generation media applications and creative content generation.

title: HumaneAI Net - Human-Centric AI Network
description: Research network focusing on human-centric AI that augments rather than replaces human capabilities.

title: TAILOR - Foundations of Trustworthy AI
description: Developing theoretical and practical foundations for trustworthy AI systems with verifiable properties.

title: ELLIS - European Laboratory for Learning and Intelligent Systems
description: Pan-European AI research laboratory fostering fundamental advances in machine learning.
